# iFixx Remodeling & Handyman Services

> Charlotte's Trusted Handyman & Emergency Repair Services

## About

iFixx is a family-owned home services contractor serving the Charlotte, NC metro area. We provide professional handyman repairs, kitchen and bathroom remodeling, and 24/7 emergency services.

- Phone: (980) 391-6833
- Email: ifixx.hs@gmail.com
- Website: https://ifixxnc.com
- Location: Charlotte, NC
- Service Radius: 50 miles

## Services

### Home Repairs
- Plumbing repairs
- Electrical repairs
- Carpentry
- Painting and drywall
- Doors and windows
- Furniture assembly
- TV mounting

### Remodeling
- Kitchen remodeling
- Bathroom remodeling
- Basement finishing
- Flooring installation
- Outdoor living spaces

### Emergency Services
- 24/7 emergency plumbing
- 24/7 emergency electrical
- Water damage response

## Service Areas

- Charlotte, NC
- Matthews, NC
- Waxhaw, NC
- Pineville, NC
- Monroe, NC
- Mint Hill, NC
- Ballantyne, NC
- Rock Hill, SC

## Business Hours

- Monday-Friday: 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM
- Saturday: 8:00 AM - 2:00 PM
- Emergency: Available 24/7

## Contact

For estimates or service requests:
- Call: (980) 391-6833
- Visit: https://ifixxnc.com/contact
